### Project Meeting \| 6-7 October 2025 \| EURECOM, Sophia Antipolis (France)

![nice-meeting](images/nice-meeting.jpeg)

The **ClimateSense** consortium met in person at EURECOM in Sophia
Antipolis for a two-day working meeting focused on coordination across
work packages and preparation for the next project phase.

#### Day 1: Progress & Planning

The first day was dedicated to work package updates from all partners,
covering: \* Stakeholder engagement and data integration \* Modelling
and geostatistical analysis \* Platform development and project
management

Discussions also addressed short-term priorities, publication plans, and
upcoming dissemination activities.

#### Day 2: Innovation & Outreach

On the second day, the consortium welcomed a keynote from **Agoratlas**,
introducing approaches to large-scale social media analysis and
coordinated online behaviour. This was followed by: \* Hands-on sessions
on annotation and data access \* Discussions on the ClimateSense
demonstrator \* Communication strategy for future COP events

The meeting concluded with agreement on next steps and coordination for
the coming months.
